section.p:
Parameters of an existing student body subdivision can be changed using either one of the following methods:
Select SubdivisionEdit from the main menu.
Press the Edit subdivision button on the toolbar.
Select Edit subdivision item from the subdivision context menu (see ).
Use the Ctrl + Alt + E keyboard shortcut.
Select a subdivision in tree view (see ) and press Enter or F2 on your keyboard.

A subdivision window (see ) will appear on your screen, where you can change subdivision name and description. Press the Save button or Enter key for the changes to take effect. Press Cancel or Esc to cancel the changes.
section.note: The software will not allow you to change a subdivision name to the one that already exists, as they must be unique. If this is case your options are pretty much the same as listed in the previous section .
